content.description: Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.
content.question: On the labeled axis provided below, draw a line to indicate the most likely relationship between body temperature and environmental temperature in the species.

frqParts.text: On the labeled axis provided below, draw a line to indicate the most likely relationship between body temperature and environmental temperature in the species.

skill.text: 2.D: Represent relationships within biological models, including mathematical models, diagrams, flowcharts, and systems.
